p: The purpose of this study was to investigate the effect of Tragacanth gum coating, individually and/or in combination with Z. multiflora Boiss. essential oil (S) and S. khuzistanica essential oil (Z) and sodium metabisulfite (M) as a chemical preservative (which widely used in the mushroom processing industry), on mushroom tissue browning, some physicochemical, and as well as sensorial changes during 16 days of storage in refrigerator (4 ± 1°C).
